column4: is there any tool i can install on ubuntu to allow me to sniff if there are any wireless networks around?
you can use 'iwlist wlan0 scan'
no scan results... strange i know there are at least 3 networks in range
Mike998: are there correct drivers installed for the card? Took me quite some effort to get mine working
Mike998 you can check with 'ifconfig -a' to see if it shows up there
Helios_:pardon me, I stepped away...
np
ndiswrapper -l shows the correct driver installed... but it's a 802.11g driver and I *think* this card can do b/g
does it say driver installed / hardware present?
yep
had to install hoary to get the thing to work
then it should work
hoarry?
yeah... i had to install hoary for it to work

can you hang on a bit - baby is crying
sure
